line.comment: * chance to spawn additional Xenon defenders for 1 Xenon station. Core of the Xenon Empire around the OCV portal tends to get reinforced first and stronger
* total number of extra Defender fleets gets capped at X% of number of Xenon sectors, default 50%
* its not actually garrisons inside the station. Changed my mind so they are actually flying around the sector now
* only 1 extra fleet per Xenon station
* Maelstrom sector itself never gets extra Xenon defenders
* adjacent to Maelstrom, needs strongest Defense
* core of the Xenon Empire up to 4 jumps around the portal. Medium Defense
* random chance to downgrade fleet power for the outer core of the empire

line.text: ' have built an extra defender fleet '

sval.val: have built an extra defender fleet
chance to spawn additional Xenon defenders for 1 Xenon station. Core of the Xenon Empire around the OCV portal tends to get reinforced first and stronger
total number of extra Defender fleets gets capped at X% of number of Xenon sectors, default 50%
its not actually garrisons inside the station. Changed my mind so they are actually flying around the sector now
only 1 extra fleet per Xenon station
Maelstrom sector itself never gets extra Xenon defenders
adjacent to Maelstrom, needs strongest Defense
core of the Xenon Empire up to 4 jumps around the portal. Medium Defense
random chance to downgrade fleet power for the outer core of the empire
